analysis.description:
Reentrancy in OpportyYearHold.unlockTokens (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#543-559):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[msg.sender].tokens) (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#552-553)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderList (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#553-555)

OpportyYearHold.returnTokens (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#535-543) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,nTokens) (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#540)

OpportyYearHold.unlockTokens (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#543-559) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[msg.sender].tokens) (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#552-553)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xca4fd347d172e0123c6056dad5f6860b3ea9250a.sol#1): it allows old versions
